title: Pre-Service Teacher Competency Development Program for Improving Instructional Design in Electronic Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A program supporting pre-service teachers in designing effective online classes using diverse digital tools. The curriculum focuses on instructional design methods aligned with modern educational standards (FS).

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three instructional design frameworks (ADDIE, SAM, etc.) suitable for electronic learning environments.
Learners can design and apply interaction strategies (discussions, feedback, collaboration) appropriate for LMS-based activities.
Learners can develop lesson modules utilizing digital resources (multimedia, open educational resources).

resources: Instructional Methods Reference Guide (eLearning Design Guide)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
